answers.answer: Causes of burning mouth syndrome include:Oral candidiasis (fungal infection)Nutritional deficiency (iron, zinc, folate, thiamin, riboflavin, vitamin B6, vitamin B12)Dry mouth eg: Sjögren's syndromeCranial nerve injuryMedication side effectAcid refluxEndocrine disorders such as diabetes and hypothyroidismMenopause

I have thought all along that it could be hypothyroidism or menopause but my docotor said that was not it.  This all started when my thyroid started acting up and when I started going through menopause which was a year ago.  Do you have any solutions?  Thanks for taking the time to respond.

question: Has anyone ever experienced Burning Mouth Syndrome?  What causes it?  What will cure it?  Will any alternative medicine work?
title: Burning Mouth Syndrome
